```{r write-redirects}
#| echo: false
# list names of post folders, 
# adapted from Dr. Danielle Navarro,
# a legit Data Witch
# https://blog.djnavarro.net/porting-to-quarto/#netlify-redirects
projects <- list.dirs(
  path = here::here("projects"),
  full.names = FALSE,
  recursive = FALSE
)
# extract the slugs
slugs <- stringr::str_remove(projects, "\\d{4}-\\d{2}-\\d{2}-(?!\\d)")
# lines to insert to a netlify _redirect file
redirects <- paste0("/", slugs, " ", "/projects/", projects)
# write the _redirect file
writeLines(redirects, here::here("docs", "_redirects"))
```
